attributes.action: Bring the Labour Party policies back in line with the working class grass roots.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The working class people of this country worry about:

Jobs
Health
Education

and the ability to attain all of the above on a fair footing with the rest of the UK work force. The labour party has moved away from these basic principles in order to follow the City of London and in particular the banking and finance systems.
